item.title: Bieber's recent behavior has some fans worried
item.description: Justin Bieber is used to getting a lot of attention, but recently he appears to be attracting the kind Britney Spears got circa 2007.
item.ExtractedText: 1 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 1. Got a haircut: Bieber ditched those side-swept bangs his fans obsessed about for a more adult (and masculine) look in 2011. Hide Caption 2 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 2. Got inked ... extensively: As evidenced by police images , Bieber has a reported 10-plus tattoos on his body. This is the same kid who started his ink collection at 16 by getting a "Jonathan Livingston Seagull" tattoo that matches his dad's. Hide Caption 3 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 3. Travels by private jet: The easiest way to tell you're no longer just YouTube famous is when you can afford to cruise the skies by private jet and maybe even light up something illegal during the flight. In January 2014, Bieber -- known for enjoying the status of a personal aircraft -- and his dad, Jeremy, allegedly refused a pilot's warning to stop smoking pot while on a flight from Canada to New Jersey. Hide Caption 4 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 4. Was exposed to scandal: The first smudge on Bieber's squeaky-clean teen image came in 2011, when a young woman named Mariah Yeater falsely claimed that Bieber fathered a child with her after a bathroom rendezvous at one of his concerts. Even though Yeater's story didn't hold water, just the thought of Bieber doing the deed with a fan made the public start to view the kid in a different way. Hide Caption 5 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 5. Got serious: He still wants to see "U Smile," but Bieber has pretty much stopped showing his pearly whites in favor of giving cameras a glare. Usually, said glare is accompanied by a furrowed brow, as expertly done by "Saturday Night Live's" Kate McKinnon. (No, seriously, you have to see it.) Hide Caption 6 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 6. Became Joe Cool: The more cynical probably assume that Bieber persistently wears sunglasses to hide evidence about his recreational activities. But we're going to assume he's constantly wearing shades because everywhere he goes is just particularly bright. Hide Caption 7 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 7. Fought with paparazzi: If you don't get into a fight with a photographer, are you really a celebrity? Bieber's breaking moment came in March 2013 when, after having a bad 19th birthday and frustrating week of performances in London, he threatened paparazzi haranguing him. Hide Caption 8 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 8. Lives fast: Bieber may love cars, but he has a horrendous driving record . He was involved in a high-speed chase with paparazzi in July 2012; was cited for making an unsafe left turn and having an expired registration in November 2012; and drove fast enough through his Calabasas, California, neighborhood in 2013 that his neighbors called the cops -- twice. And then, in January 2014, he was arrested and charged with drunken driving, resisting arrest and driving without a valid license. Hide Caption 9 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 9. Fell in love: Justin Bieber's on-again, off-again relationship with Selena Gomez lasted about three years, but more important, the romance helped to show that Bieber was capable of wooing a star of Gomez's caliber (and a slightly older one, at that). Hide Caption 10 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 10. Got arrested. Twice. In one week: In case anyone, anywhere missed the memo about Bieber being music's newest bad boy, the star got himself arrested twice in one week. He was arrested in Miami on January 23, 2014, on a DUI charge, and again in Toronto on January 29 for an alleged assault charge. Not to mention he was also dealing with California officials who are investigating a potential vandalism charge for an alleged egging. Hide Caption 11 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 11. Embraced risky fashion: It's pretty impossible to be on the cover of a teenybopper magazine like Tiger Beat when you're wearing a gas mask, which we assume is the point when Bieber elects to wear increasingly outrageous outfits and accessories. Lady Gaga, watch your back. Hide Caption 12 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 12. Ditched his belts: To shed teen stardom you usually have to go full Britney or Miley and embrace nudity. Bieber's pulled that off in two ways: First, he cultivated a dysfunctional relationship with belts, as seen here in 2012 ... Hide Caption 13 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 13. Stopped wearing shirts: And then, he started walking around topless, like when he was in London for his 19th birthday in 2013. Hide Caption 14 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 14. Started sampling the nightlife: According to the rumor mill, Justin Bieber enjoys strippers , and he's a very, very big tipper . Whether he actually visits strip clubs or not -- and he wasn't here; this picture was taken outside of Miami's Mansion night club -- isn't really the point. As in the case of Mariah Yeater, the woman who made the Bieber-daddy claim, just the insinuation that he's a fan of "adult entertainment" is enough to distance himself from his teen star reputation. Hide Caption 15 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 15. Drag-raced with a model: Everyone knows that misbehaving rock stars and models are essentially magnets, so Bieber was sure to have model Chantel Jeffries riding shotgun when he was pulled over for racing in Miami. Hide Caption 16 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 16. Created a personal "frat house": According to a detective with the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department, Bieber crafted a "frat house" among the multimillion-dollar mansions in Calabasas, California. There were ping-pong and pool tables, a Ms. Pac-Man video game and a basketball free-throw machine, plus a skateboard ramp covered with spray-painted graffiti in the back. He's since sold the home to Khloe Kardashian. Hide Caption 17 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 17. Developed a selfie obsession: Biebs broke out with YouTube videos of his performances, so his predilection for taking his own photos (constantly) is a natural evolution. Hide Caption 18 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 18. Made famous friends: Bieber came into this business with one known famous friend (Usher). Now look how many he has! In Atlanta in 2014, he partied with the likes of Sean "P. Diddy" Combs, Rick Ross and Wale. Hide Caption 19 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 19. Released a "sexy" music video: Remember the 2010 music video for Bieber's "Baby," when the closest he came to touching a girl was gallantly grabbing her hand? "All That Matters," released in the fall of 2013, was just suggestive enough to show that Bieber's interests are now more grown-up but not so illicit that it would be totally inappropriate for a still young fanbase. Hide Caption 20 of 22 22 photos: 21 ways Bieber's gone from 'Baby' to 'Bizzle' 20. Works hard at growing a mustache: Through the years, Justin Bieber has been nothing if not determined. His songs have gotten stronger, his escapades have gotten wilder, and his fame has only gotten bigger. We're pretty confident he'll pull through these growing pains and be able to transition to greater maturity. And when he does, his facial hair will tell the story. Hide Caption
